text: All Together Now is a British reality television music competition which first aired on BBC One on 27 January 2018. It was presented by Rob Beckett and Geri Halliwell (credited as Geri Horner). In June 2019, the BBC decided to cancel the show after two series. ==References== Category:2018 British television series debuts Category:2019 television series endings Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British reality television series Category:English- language television programs Category:Reality television competitions
title: All Together Now
